story.paragraph1: Founded in 2012, Purvodaya Energy Solutions began with a simple mission: to make clean, renewable energy accessible and affordable for every Indian household and business.
story.paragraph2: Over the past decade, we have grown from a small startup to one of India's most trusted solar energy providers, completing over 2,500 installations across multiple states.
story.paragraph3: Our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction has made us the preferred choice for residential, commercial, and industrial solar solutions.

leadCapture.0: üéØ **Ready to get started?** Our solar experts can provide a free site assessment and custom quote for your property. It takes just 30 minutes and could save you lakhs! Interested?
leadCapture.1: üí° **Want to see your actual savings potential?** We offer free energy audits that show exactly how much you could save with solar. No obligations - just valuable insights about your energy future!

responses.cost:
üí∞ **Solar System Costs in India:**

‚Ä¢ **Residential (1-10kW):** ‚Çπ40,000 - ‚Çπ80,000 per kW
‚Ä¢ **Commercial (10kW+):** ‚Çπ35,000 - ‚Çπ65,000 per kW
‚Ä¢ **5kW home system:** ‚Çπ2 - 4 lakhs (after subsidies)
‚Ä¢ **10kW system:** ‚Çπ4 - 7 lakhs (after subsidies)

*Prices include panels, inverter, installation & 5-year warranty.*

Would you like a personalized quote? üìã
responses.financing:
üí≥ **Solar Financing Options:**

**1. Cash Purchase** ‚úÖ Best ROI, immediate ownership
**2. Solar Loan** üè¶ 2-6% interest, 5-15 year terms
**3. Lease/PPA** üìÑ ‚Çπ0 down, pay monthly (commercial)
**4. NBFC Financing** üí∞ Up to 80% funding

**EMI Example:**
A ‚Çπ5L system could be ~‚Çπ8,500/month for 5 years, while your monthly savings could be ‚Çπ12,000. That's a **net benefit from day one!** üìà

Want to calculate your EMI? üßÆ
responses.installation:
üîß **Solar Installation Process:**

**Step 1:** Site Survey & Design (1-2 days)
**Step 2:** Permits & Approvals (7-15 days)
**Step 3:** Equipment Procurement (3-7 days)
**Step 4:** Installation (1-3 days)
**Step 5:** Grid Connection & Testing (2-5 days)
**Step 6:** Net Metering Setup (7-30 days)

‚è±Ô∏è **Total Time:** 3-8 weeks
üè† **Roof Requirements:** ~100 sq ft per kW

Need a site assessment? We offer free surveys! üìã
responses.maintenance:
üßπ **Solar Maintenance Guide:**

**Monthly:** Visual inspection for debris.
**Quarterly:** Panel cleaning (more often in dusty areas).
**Annually:** Professional checkup (recommended).

**Cleaning Tips:**
‚Ä¢ Use a soft brush and water, ideally in the early morning or evening.
‚Ä¢ Avoid harsh chemicals.

**Monitoring:**
‚Ä¢ We provide a mobile app for real-time performance tracking.
‚Ä¢ Our team also monitors your system remotely.

Our systems are designed for low maintenance, but regular cleaning can boost performance by 15-20%! Want to know about our maintenance packages? üîß
responses.savings:
üìä **Solar Savings Calculator:**

**Example 5kW System:**
‚Ä¢ Monthly Generation: ~750 units
‚Ä¢ Current Bill: ‚Çπ15,000/month
‚Ä¢ With Solar: ~‚Çπ2,000/month
‚Ä¢ **Monthly Savings: ‚Çπ13,000** üí∞
‚Ä¢ **Annual Savings: ‚Çπ1,56,000** üìà
‚Ä¢ **25-year Savings: Over ‚Çπ39 lakhs** üéØ

**Payback Period:** 3-4 years
**ROI:** 25-30% annually

To calculate YOUR savings, I need your monthly electricity bill amount and your location. Shall we calculate your potential savings? üßÆ
responses.subsidy:
üèõÔ∏è **Government Subsidies Available:**

‚Ä¢ **Central Subsidy:** Up to ‚Çπ18,000 per kW (max 3kW)
‚Ä¢ **State Subsidies:** Additional 10-30% in many states
‚Ä¢ **Net Metering:** Sell excess power back to the grid
‚Ä¢ **Tax Benefits:** 30% depreciation for businesses
‚Ä¢ **Low-interest loans:** 2-6% interest rates

**Example:** A 5kW system costing ‚Çπ3L becomes ~‚Çπ1.8L after subsidies.

Which state are you in? I can check for specific subsidies! üó∫Ô∏è
responses.technical:
üî¨ **Technical Information:**

**Panel Types:**
‚Ä¢ **Monocrystalline:** 20-22% efficiency, premium look.
‚Ä¢ **Polycrystalline:** 18-20% efficiency, very economical.
‚Ä¢ **Bifacial:** Up to 25% more power, latest technology.

**Inverter Types:**
‚Ä¢ **String Inverters:** Cost-effective for unshaded roofs.
‚Ä¢ **Microinverters:** Maximum efficiency per panel, best for complex roofs.

**System Specs:**
‚Ä¢ **Warranty:** 25 years on panels, 5-12 years on inverters.
‚Ä¢ **Performance:** 80% efficiency guaranteed after 25 years.

Any specific technical questions? ‚öôÔ∏è
responses.types:
‚ö° **Solar System Types:**

**üîå On-Grid (Grid-Tied)**
‚Ä¢ Connected to electricity grid
‚Ä¢ Sell excess power back
‚Ä¢ No battery backup
‚Ä¢ Cost: ‚Çπ40-60k per kW
‚Ä¢ Best for: Reliable grid areas

**üîã Off-Grid (Standalone)**
‚Ä¢ Complete independence
‚Ä¢ Battery backup included
‚Ä¢ Works during power cuts
‚Ä¢ Cost: ‚Çπ80-120k per kW
‚Ä¢ Best for: Remote areas

**‚ö°üîã Hybrid System**
‚Ä¢ Best of both worlds
‚Ä¢ Grid connection + batteries
‚Ä¢ Backup during outages
‚Ä¢ Cost: ‚Çπ70-100k per kW
‚Ä¢ Best for: Urban areas with power cuts

Which type interests you? ü§î

0.answer: Solar system costs vary based on size and requirements. Residential systems (1-10kW) typically cost ‚Çπ40,000-‚Çπ80,000 per kW including installation. Commercial systems offer better rates per kW. We provide free detailed quotes after site assessment.
0.question: How much does a solar system cost?

1.answer: Most customers save 70-90% on their electricity bills. A properly sized solar system can save ‚Çπ10,000-‚Çπ15,000 per month for an average household. Savings depend on your current electricity consumption, system size, and local electricity rates.
1.question: How much can I save with solar panels?

2.answer: Residential installations typically take 1-3 days depending on system size and roof complexity. Commercial installations take 3-7 days. Industrial projects may take 1-4 weeks. We handle all permits and paperwork to minimize delays.
2.question: How long does installation take?

3.answer: The Central Government provides subsidies up to ‚Çπ78,000 for residential solar systems up to 10kW. Additional state subsidies may apply. We assist with all subsidy applications and documentation to maximize your benefits.
3.question: What government subsidies are available?

4.answer: We provide comprehensive warranties: 25 years on solar panels, 5-10 years on inverters, 10 years on mounting structures, and 5 years on installation workmanship. We also offer extended warranty options.
4.question: What warranty do you provide?

5.answer: Yes, solar panels generate electricity even on cloudy days, though at reduced capacity (10-30% of sunny day output). Grid-connected systems ensure continuous power supply, and excess sunny day production compensates for cloudy periods.
5.question: Do solar panels work during monsoon/cloudy days?

6.answer: Solar panels require minimal maintenance - mainly periodic cleaning and annual inspections. We recommend professional cleaning every 2-3 months in dusty areas. Our maintenance packages include regular cleaning, performance monitoring, and technical support.
6.question: What maintenance is required?

7.answer: Most roofs are suitable for solar installation. We evaluate factors like roof age, structure, orientation, shading, and available space during our free site survey. We can work with various roof types including concrete, metal, and tile roofs.
7.question: How do I know if my roof is suitable for solar?
